Title: Map Editor: Overview
Contents: The Map Editor allows you to edit the map files used by the game, also known as MSB files.
[Highlight@2]: Hover over the map you wish to edit in the Map Object List
[Highlight@3]: Right-click to bring up the context menu, select Load Map
A simple explanation covering each of the high-level map object types:
Map objects that control map attributes or state.
Map objects that control the spot and directional lightning within a map.
Map objects are entities within the map that the player interacts with, or that shape the level.
Map objects that represent areas, either for detection or for placement.
